actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to make the maximum penalty for distributing or manufacturing a controlled substance in or near a park or recreational facility commensurate with the maximum penalty for distributing or manufacturing a controlled substance in or near a school.
short_title: Drug-Free Parks and Recreation Facilities Act of 1988

summary.text: Drug-Free Parks and Recreation Facilities Act of 1988 - Amends the Controlled Substances Act to impose enhanced penalties for distribution or manufacture of controlled substances in or near public recreational facilities.

titles.title: Drug-Free Parks and Recreation Facilities Act of 1988

A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to make the maximum penalty for distributing or manufacturing a controlled substance in or near a park or recreational facility commensurate with the maximum penalty for distributing or manufacturing a controlled substance in or near a school.
